title: MCA Introduces Companies Compliance Facilitation Scheme, 2026 (CCFS-2026) – A Golden Opportunity!
content:
# MCA Introduces Companies Compliance Facilitation Scheme, 2026 (CCFS-2026) – A Golden Opportunity!

Ek important update hai. Government ne pending statutory filings ko regularize karne ke liye "Companies Compliance Facilitation Scheme, 2026 (CCFS-2026)" announce kiya hai. This scheme offers a one-time opportunity for companies to complete their overdue filings with significantly reduced additional fees.

This initiative by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) aims to improve compliance levels, ensure updated information in the corporate registry, and support various business entities, including MSMEs and One Person Companies (OPCs), by easing the financial burden of delayed filings.

**Key Highlights of CCFS-2026:**

*   **Scheme Name:** Companies Compliance Facilitation Scheme, 2026 (CCFS-2026)
*   **Announcement:** General Circular No. 01/2026, issued on February 24, 2026.
*   **Operational Period:** The scheme will be operational from April 15, 2026, to July 15, 2026.
*   **Applicability:** It covers condonation of delay for filing annual returns, financial statements, and other e-forms under the Companies Act, 2013, and the Companies Act, 1956, including forms like MGT-7, AOC-4, and ADT-1.
*   **Reduced Fees:**
    *   For pending statutory filings: Companies can complete these by paying only 10% of the normal additional fees.
    *   For "Dormant Company" status application: 50% reduction in the normal fee.
    *   For striking-off application: Only 25% of the applicable fee.

This is a great chance for companies to regularize their compliance without a heavy financial penalty.
